channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description: 1st:what do i add if i whant to make all my spells not require runes? 2nd:what do i add if i whant to make the fire cape has emotes?

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @Anonomus111 Anonomus111
item.description:
@Anonomus111 wrote:

I think I know the answer to # 1.
Although, this may not concern your server…

I opened my Client.java file in my source, and searched for a spell. I searched and searched and found all spells. It was all like item = 554 3.
Then I was all like item = 554 -1.

Worked for me. Took a while to edit all those spells though. Sorry if this didn’t help, but it should.

Read full topic
